question: Who became the first Indian gymnast to win an individual medal at the Gymnastics World Cup?
explanation: Aruna Budda Reddy became the first Indian gymnast to win an individual medal at the Gymnastics World Cup by bagging a bronze medal in the women's vault event, in Melbourne, Australia. Aruna Budda Reddy scored 13.649 in the women's vault event and finished in the third position. She won the bronze medal in the women's vault event. Aruna Budda Reddy will also participate in the final round of the floor event on 25th February 2018. India's Rakesh Patra finished in the fourth position in the men's rings event. A total of 16 countries are taking part in the Gymnastics World Cup in Melbourne.
